resources.string: KeyWave allows you to control music playback using volume buttons when your screen is off. Long-press volume up for next track, volume down for previous track, or both for play/pause.

Control your music playback using volume buttons:
• Long-press Volume Up = Next Track
• Long-press Volume Down = Previous Track
• Long-press Both = Play/Pause
KeyWave needs accessibility service permissions to detect volume button presses.
Enables verbose logging for troubleshooting. May impact performance slightly.
Notification to keep KeyWave service active
